another obstacle to vaccination is the

made a baseless and disproven link

rubella jab and autism 20 years ago some
now completely discredited research
published in The Lancet medical journal
which looked at just 12 children sparked

be linked to childhood behavioral issues
autism the vast overwhelming majority of
scientists and medics around the world

there is no link in fact Andrew

but the anti-vaccine movement is as old
as well vaccines and since the 18th

the World Health Organization says the

some groups distrust their government
